title: Night Plague
description: For generations, the Night Warriors have used their awesome powers to defend humanity from evil, entering men's dreams to change the shape of waking reality. Now, five modern Night Warriors face their most terrifying enemy.She is Isabel Gowdie, witch and mistress of Satan. Entombed for three centuries, her powers have grown stronger. Now her evil influence seeps through the earth, carrying the seeds of the Night Plague, a disease which twists men's souls into madness. The Night Warriors can stop it if they can find Isabel Gowdie's hidden prison. But time is short. With each night's sleep more and more of humankind falls to the Plague, and two of the Night Warriors are already infected.
author: Graham Masterton
